item.description: If you have problems with your dryer, this article explains how to repair the most common dryer issues including no heat, long dry times, loud operation, and venting problems. Expert troubleshooting tips from certified technicians.

item.title: Dryer Not Heating Up or Drying Clothes? Electric & Gas Fixes
item.description: Dryer not heating up or drying clothes? Check venting, 240V power, thermal fuse, heating element, igniter and gas coils. Works for electric and gas models.

item.title: How to Replace Dryer Thermal Fuse (Part#279816) - ARS Repair
item.description: If you are having any problem with your dryer not drying clothes, you may need to replace the Dryer Thermal Fuse (Part# 279816, W279816, WP 279816).
